status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

worklogs.comment:
AlenkaF opened a new pull request, #14040:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14040

   This PR tries to fix a failing `macos-arm` benchmark build.

github-actions[bot] commented on PR #14040:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14040#issuecomment-1236532217

   :warning: Ticket **has not been started in JIRA**, please click 'Start Progress'.

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

comments.body:
There is currently a workaround in the buildkite setup to avoid the import error, see [buildkite/benchmark/utils.sh|https://github.com/voltrondata-labs/arrow-benchmarks-ci/commit/14ef68d7d17b4dd9370bb6a63876ad083d7cdd09#diff-310e0e86a3d427cdc9a36e32c60fb40dc1b6e67ca861be9c421bdbc66c804e3f].

I think this is still something that should be investigated on the benchmarks side. Closing this here as it is not connected to the PyArrow build itself.
